001/**
002 * Class Command - Represents a command issued by the player in the game.
003 * 
004 * A Command object stores a primary command word and, optionally, a second word
005 * that provides additional details.
006 * 
007 * 
008 * @author Florian NELCHA
009 */
010public class Command
011{
012    // ### Attributes ###
013
014    private String aCommandWord;
015    private String aSecondWord;
016    
017    // ### Constructor ###
018    
019    /**
020     * Constructor that creates a Command object with a command word and an optional
021     * second word.
022     * 
023     * @param pW1 The main command word.
024     * @param pW2 An optional second word (e.g., direction or item).
025     */
026    public Command(final String pW1,final String pW2)
027    {
028        this.aCommandWord = pW1;
029        this.aSecondWord = pW2;
030    } // Command()
031    
032    // ### Getters ###
033    
034    /**
035     * Gets the main command word.
036     * 
037     * @return The main command word.
038     */
039    public String getCommandWord()
040    {
041        return this.aCommandWord;
042    } // getCommandWord()
043    
044    /**
045     * Gets the secondary word if available.
046     * 
047     * @return The secondary word, or null if it does not exist.
048     */
049    public String getSecondWord()
050    {
051        return this.aSecondWord;
052    } // getSecondWord()
053    
054    // ### Other methods ###
055    
056    /**
057     * Checks if the command includes a secondary word.
058     * 
059     * @return true if there is a secondary word, false otherwise.
060     */
061    public boolean hasSecondWord()
062    {
063        return this.aSecondWord != null;
064    } // hasSecondWord()
065    
066    /**
067     * Checks if the command is unknown (if it has no main command word).
068     * 
069     * @return true if the command word is null, false otherwise.
070     */
071    public boolean isUnknown()
072    {
073        return this.aCommandWord == null;
074    } // isUnknown()
075} // Command
